content: I think I'll start by asking around at local jewelry stores or bead shops to see if they know of a reputable pearl restorer in the area. I also want to get my silver chain necklace checked to make sure it's still in good condition after the repair. Do you think I should take it to the same place I plan to take my pearl earrings, or would it be better to take it to a separate jeweler that specializes in silver?
